sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import {listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const {} = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> GO BACK

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'in stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) }; export default ProductScreen;
